dg.squash.ecs

Class SystemEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • dg.squash.ecs.SystemEngine

  • public class SystemEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the systems and their interactions with each other.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SystemEngine(EntityEngine entityEngine)
      Creates default system engine with supplied entity engine.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemEngine

        public SystemEngine(EntityEngine entityEngine)
        Creates default system engine with supplied entity engine.
        Parameters:
        entityEngine - all the entities on which systems works on

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public <T extends Component> void update(Entity entity,
                                         java.lang.Class<T> component)
        Updates an entity. This method should be called only from system classes which updates (change component state) only of one entity.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the component to be updated
        Parameters:
        entity - to be update
        component - of the entity to be updated

      • update

        public void update(Entity e1,
                   Entity e2)
        Update entities. This method should be called only from system classes which updates (change component state) of two entities.
        Parameters:
        e1 - first entity for the systems
        e2 - second entity for the systems

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts system engine. First it goes through all the entities which can listen input from the users and updates them. Next it moves all the entities and finally resolves all the collisions.
